es.uvigo.darwin.prottest.global.options
Class ApplicationOptions

java.lang.Object
  es.uvigo.darwin.prottest.global.options.ApplicationOptions

public class ApplicationOptions
extends java.lang.Object

The ProtTest application options models the common global options for the application execution. It is a singleton class which gathers all necessary options to run.
